game.description: Retrieve the legendary Sword of Light from the depths of the Dark Forest, said to be able to vanquish any darkness.
game.objective: Obtain the Sword of Light and bring it back to the village elder.
game.reward: 1000 Gold Coins, a boost in reputation among the villagers, and a magical amulet granting resistance to darkness.

tasks.description: Gather information about the Sword of Light's whereabouts from travelers and locals at the town tavern.
tasks.objective: Talk to at least three people and gather useful information.

tasks.description: Venture into the Dark Forest, overcoming obstacles and defeating dark creatures along the way.
tasks.objective: Reach the heart of the forest where the sword is said to be hidden.

game.title: The Quest for the Sword of Light
